title: 367 wan Him and Her (2015)
overview: The movie, 367 Days: Him and Her, tells the story of Head and Tine, played by Kanut Rojanai (Baan) and Cholrudee Amornluk (Joon), who fall in love in high school and date until they graduate from university. Their relationship becomes long-distance after Tine moves to live with her mom in Hong Kong.
